pages.text:
Experience The Bar at F/S
Whiskey Tastings
Our Events
Private Events
The Bar / Cocktails
Blended…then shaken or stirred
Blended spirits mean
exceptional cocktails
We welcome all flavor preferences to the distillery and create gins, rums, vodkas, and other spirits we use in our very own cocktails. With our talented team of bartenders, we offer a complete & seasonal cocktail menu you can enjoy in our tasting room or spacious outdoor patio.
Weekdays enjoy our happy hour from 4pm – 6:30pm.
Whether you’re a whiskey enthusiast or getting your first taste, we invite you to be a part of a FORWARD/SLASH tasting experience. Book a 90-minute private whiskey tasting for you and up to 8-10 guests where you’ll receive:
• A welcome cocktail
• A guided tour of our tasting room & full distillery
• An in-depth look at our blending process and methodology with a carefully curated flight sampling of our spirits
Cocktails are great, but I’m here for the whiskey
Book a tasting
Tour & Pour
Feeling spontaneous?
Visit us any day we’re open and sample our full arsenal of whiskeys through your very own flight. Our knowledgeable staff will ensure each of your pours are tailored to your palate.
Tour & Pour
– add this to your bill next time you’re in and get a 20-minute distillery tour with a 1 oz pour.
Upcoming events.
Whether at the distillery or in our local Central Florida community, stay up to date with where to find us plus unique workshops and experiences we host each month.
Text
JOIN
to
844-748-8620
for event reminders!*
Book an experience
*Message and data rates may apply
Host Your Next Event at F/S
If you’re searching for a unique setting for your next event, our tasting room and outside areas are perfect for private events. Our space accommodates parties of up to 50 and is ideal for celebrations ranging from guys night out, birthdays, corporate events, retirement parties, and holiday parties.
